content: Release 3 has been published. See http://hl7.org/fhir, and also https://onfhir.hl7.org/2017/03/22/fhir-release-3-posted/
Also, the US Core implementation Guide has been published: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core

AEGIS @Richard Ettema and the Touchstone Team are proud to announce we have published Touchstone V3.4.2 with FHIR Release 3 testing support (same day as FHIR Release 3 was published). Be one of the first to register your FHIR R3 Server and Client and test against FHIR R3 Test Script Resources. Or, test backwards compatibility between FHIR earlier versions (DSTU 2 and STU 3 candidate releases) and FHIR R3. Using TDD and Touchstone to guide your upgrade path and efforts. Touchstone can be found at www.touchstone.com
To adapt a famous quote from WS Churchill - never in the field of digital healthcare has so much been owed by so many to so few.
@Mario Hyland impressive, congrats on TouchStone for STU3, great job guys!
